long_description: The Granite Gear Lineloc Top Lid upgrades the lidless Blaze, Trace, Crown and Escape packs for hikers who prefer the added space and convenience of a lid. Large main compartment features a wide zippered opening; internal mesh pocket keeps small items organized. The Granite Gear Lineloc Top Lid can be easily converted into a waist pack for quick forays away from camp.
short_description: The Granite Gear Lineloc Top Lid upgrades the lidless Blaze, Trace, Crown and Escape packs for hikers who prefer the added space and convenience of a lid.
